Function fAnzahlDatensaetzeRechnungen(sTabelle AS String,lDocumentID AS Long) AS integer Dim oRecord1 AS Object Dim sSQL1 AS String sSQL1="SELECT count(*) FROM "& sTabelle &" WHERE RechnungsID="& lDocumentID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fAnzahlDatensaetzeRechnungen=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function flDocumentID_import AS long sSQL1="SELECT Max(RechnungsID) FROM "& sEingangsrechnungen oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() flDocumentID_import=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
Function flMax_Datensatz(sTabelle AS String,sCol AS String) AS long sSQL1="SELECT Max("& sCol &") FROM "& sTabelle oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() flMax_Datensatz=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function flDocumentID_import_auto(iRefresh AS integer) AS string STATIC lDocumentID_2 AS String Dim sDocumentID_1 AS String,sDocumentID_2 AS String Dim sJahr AS String,sJahr_1 AS String,sJahr_2 AS String Dim sMonat AS String,sMonat_1 AS String,sMonat_2 AS String Dim iMonat AS integer Dim sNummer_1 AS String,sNummer_2 AS String if iRefresh = 1 then sDocumentID_1=flMax_Datensatz(sEingangsrechnungen,"RechnungsID") sJahr_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,1,4) sMonat_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,5,2) sNummer_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,7) sJahr=YEAR(Now) sMonat=MONTH(Now) iMonat=MONTH(Now) if iMonat<10 then sMonat= "0" & MONTH(Now) End if if sJahr_1=sJahr then sJahr_2=sJahr_1 sNummer_2=sNummer_1 else sJahr_2=sJahr sNummer_2="0001" End if if sMonat_1=sMonat then sMonat_2=sMonat_1 else sMonat_2=sMonat End if sDocumentID_2=sJahr_2 & sMonat_2 & sNummer_2 lDocumentID_2=sDocumentID_2 End if flDocumentID_import=lDocumentID_2 End Function
Function GetDocUserProperty(sPropertyName AS String) AS String Dim oUserProps AS Object ' On Error Resume Next oUserProps = oDoc.DocumentProperties.getUserDefinedProperties() if oUserProps.getPropertySetInfo().hasPropertyByName(sPropertyName) = True then GetDocUserProperty = oUserProps.getPropertyValue(sPropertyName) else GetDocUserProperty = "" end if End Function
